Articles.Content: Hi everyone. I've been playing with sigma dimensions and Kopernicus to resize the planets. I am having trouble with the lighting on planets such as the Mun and minmus with only the lower terrain being lit, with the rest of the terrain staying dark. I am also using SVE, EVE, scatter and better time warp. I was wondering if this was possible to fix. Thanks!
Welcome to the forum @KerbalLauncher66, your issue has been moved to add-on discussions for better visibility of our mod using/creating community.

Which version of KSP?

I think there are compatibility issues if you try using SVE, EVE, and Scatterer at the same time. Uninstall SVE to see if the problem goes away, and if it does then check the SVE thread for more information.
